name: Simple 2000 Ultimate Vol. 3: Saisoku! Zokusha King
synopsis: Put the pedal to the metal in some of the meanest Japanese muscle cars ever seen. MaXXed Out Racing lets you tune up your own gas-guzzling high-speed monster! When you're ready to race take to treacherous Japanese streets, off-road hill runs and intense circuits in a quest to beat 12 of the meanest street racers in a series of tough challenges. MaXX out your car with a huge selection of paintwork, parts and upgrades to ensure that you become street racing champion!
